item.title: Break Out The Cage - TryHackMe
item.description: Break Out the Cage is another recently released easy box on TryHackme. Let’s start off with a port scan with nmap -p- -T4 [machine ip] This will return 3 open ports: ftp, ssh, and http. Let’s enumerate these 3 ports with nmap -sC -sV -O -p 21,22,80 [machine ip]. It appears that there is anonymous FTP access open, let’s login as anonymous with ftp [machine ip] and enter anonymous for the username and password.
